about_the_game:
Nam is a stubborn man with an insatiable curiosity, a trait that leads him into the deepest recesses of the dream realm. Here, reality and illusion intertwine in a tapestry of surreal landscapes and enigmatic puzzles. As Nam ventures further, the distinction between the waking world and the dream realm becomes increasingly blurred, setting the stage for a chilling journey.

In these depths, something malevolent lies in wait. An ancient nightmare, a presence that thrives on fear and despair, stalks Nam with relentless tenacity. As he delves deeper, Something sinister lurks within these nightmares, something that feeds on fear and despair. This malevolent presence is waiting for Nam, watching his every move, and it will stop at nothing to draw him deeper into the abyss.

Immersive Graphics: The graphics will give players a detailed, terrifying world to explore yet easy to run on low end hardware.

Survival Horror Experience: You can fight back but not all the time, if your health is low your only chance is to run... or hide

Stealth Mechanics: Evade the ever-watchful nightmare through stealth-based gameplay, utilizing the environment to hide and outsmart the lurking horrors.

Dynamic Storytelling: Your choices and actions will affect the narrative's outcome, leading to multiple endings that reflect Nam's journey through the dreamscape.

Characters :

Nam: The protagonist, whose determination and curiosity drive him to explore the dream realm. As he faces his deepest fears, he must also grapple with the possibility that he may never wake up.

The Nightmare: A sinister and ancient entity that haunts the dream realms. Its true nature and intentions are cloaked in mystery, but its presence is a constant threat to Nam.

Development :

The Horrors Origins is a collaborative effort between QuocMT and Shutter Studios, a team dedicated to creating immersive and thought-provoking horror experiences. With a focus on rich storytelling and atmospheric design, this partnership aims to redefine the psychological horror genre in gaming.

Conclusion :

Prepare to embark on a journey where dreams and reality merge into a single, terrifying experience. In The Horrors Origins, every step forward brings you closer to confronting the darkness within and the ancient nightmare that awaits. Can you unravel the mysteries of the dream realm, or will you be consumed by the horrors lurking within?

"The game was made only by QuocMT."

content_descriptors.notes:
Mature Content Description
Our game features mature content that may not be suitable for all players. The following elements are present:

Violence
Intense Combat: The game includes frequent and intense combat sequences with realistic depictions of injury and death.
Graphic Scenes: There are graphic depictions of violence, including blood, gore, and dismemberment.
Language
Strong Language: The dialogue contains frequent use of strong language and explicit words that reflect the game's mature themes and setting.
Psychological Themes
Dark Themes: The storyline explores dark and complex themes, including mental health issues, trauma, and moral ambiguity.
Horror Elements: The game includes psychological horror elements that may be disturbing or unsettling.
Player Discretion Advised
We recommend that players who may be sensitive to these themes exercise discretion and consider whether this game is appropriate for their personal comfort and tolerance levels.

Please ensure you review the content and rating information to make an informed decision about your gameplay experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 / 11, 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240 or AMD A6-7480
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM, NVIDIA Geforce GTX 950 / AMD Radeon RX 460
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Targetting 720p @ 30 fps
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 / 11, 64-bits
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or Intel Core i5-6400
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB VRAM, NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1650 Super / AMD Radeon RX 6500 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Targetting 1080P @ 60 fps
